and these are the Registries which we
support So to give you a quick recap of
everything we covered in this short
demonstration defron will give you
visibility of different workloads
deployed across multiple different

oci
Registries before ending just a quick

Enterprise features such as advanced

we have support for cluster and Helm
applications
cataloges we can also help you easily

developers so that they can easily get
Cube CTL access to the cluster we have

a particular user will have access to
the a particular user will have access

amount of time we have support for air
gap clusters we have an interesting
feature which is the Pod restart
snapshot so let's say that you had a pod
running and for some reason the Pod dies
out and a new pod gets created in its
place you can take a snapshot of the pod
right as it got deleted so you have all
the different logs of it which can help
you debug exactly why the Pod was
deleted and with the Enterprise features
of defron you also get clustered connect
via SSH and proxy and that's all the
great features that defron offers you
for managing your kubernetes workloads
